text:
@EricTrump Since the point at which your dad finished riding on the coattails of @BarackObama's run, it's gone up to 27.2k as of 6/9/20. 
Given your family's understanding of financial matters, I can see why you're excited 🙄

Don't forget the COVID-19 dead, either.
